summary: Create a website link for the charity CHILDSHIELD OUTREACH FOUNDATION.

existing_features.title: Create a public, single-page website (landing page) for the charity named “CHILDSHIELD OUTREACH FOUNDATION”, accessible at the app’s root URL (/), with clear on-page sections and navigation.
Apply a coherent, distinctive visual theme appropriate for a child-focused charity (consistent colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) across the landing page.
Add basic SEO and share metadata for the landing page (document title and meta description) reflecting “CHILDSHIELD OUTREACH FOUNDATION”.
Include generated static image assets (logo and hero/banner illustration) and render them on the landing page using static hosting (not served via the backend).
Update the “Get Involved” section so the “Donate” option includes a Bitcoin (BTC) donation address as an additional donation method, displayed on the website.
Add an optional BTC QR code presentation for the configured BTC address within the donation UI (generated client-side) and ensure the donation UI is accessible.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a website link (URL/landing page) for CHILDSHIELD OUTREACH FOUNDATION
Add a Bitcoin (BTC) address as a donation option on the website (display wallet address/QR as applicable)
